column5: Recently there has been a few posts from guys asking about fish finders and with today's economy everyone is trying to save a buck...so with that said Cabela's emailed me this notice and I thought I would pass it on..  http://www.cabelas.com/browse.cmd?categoryId=107036280&WT.tsrc=EML&WT.mc_id=email-bc&eid=39774&cmp=I110311A&seg=FI1&cnt=6726&ctb=browse.cmd  Bob
I saw that and wondered myself, i am assuming they were the returns when the HDS units were having water problems when they first came out.

You're exactly right.....Cabela's purchased all the reconditioned units from Lowrance which is great news for someone trying to get the latest Sonar/GPS unit without having to pay the full price.  Bob
